RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 63. Maiden Claiming Purse 38000. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Weight, 119 lbs. Claiming Price $30,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TWO'S A CROWD chased four then three wide in closest aim of the leader coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung four wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command a furlong out, inched away in the late stages kept to task. RETAIL MAN broke in at the start, showed the way in hand just off the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, continued just off the inside into upper stretch, got headed a furlong out, ran on to safely preserve the place honors. MAD BANKER chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide for home, kept on to the finish. ONE WITHEVERYTHING three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch, weakened in the drive. BLUE EIGHTY FIVE broke in at the start under hustling, chased just off the inside until tucked inside into the turn, came under coaxing midway, angled three to four wide into upper stretch and offered no response. PAPA DO PAPA DO shied in at the start, chased two to three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled six wide into upper stretch, tired. SOLO IN PARIS broke in at the start, chased two to three wide down the backstretch and then three to four wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung six wide into upper stretch, ducked inwards straightened away with three-sixteenths to go and made no impact.

ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, chased 2-3w, coaxed 3-4w 3/8, 6w upper, no impact

ENTRY.OWNER: LRE Racing LLC and JEH Racing Stable LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, hustled, chased 2p, ins turn, 3-4w upper, no response

ENTRY.COMMENT: shied in st, chased 2-3w, coaxed 3/8, 6w upper, tired

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, kept on

ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, in hand 2p, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, headed 1/8, ran on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 94. Claiming Purse 62000. (UP TO $10,788 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $32,000 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $25,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (1.5% After care Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PRINTRACK coaxed from the gate, showed the way in hand along the inside, continued in the inside route into upper stretch, got roused nearing the eighth pole, dug in and held well and safe to prevail. FLINT RIDGE chased four to five wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch, ran on to secure the place honors. CAJUN CASANOVA coaxed from the gate, chased two to three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, kept on to the finish. SHIVAREE chased three to four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide for home, kept on through to the wire. FLAMINGO HAWK hustled from the gate, chased just off the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide for home, made no headway. BEACHWALKER coaxed from the start, chased two to three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled four to five wide for home and offered no response.

ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, chased 2p, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, no headway

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 92. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 85000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $45,000. T hree Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $45,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AGGREGATION showed the way in hand just off the inside, tucked inside through the turn coming under coaxing near the quarter pole before being set down spinning just off the inside into upper stretch, then edged clear under a drive kept to task. SHADOW DRAGON six paths off the inside early on, tucked three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, went five to six wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild kick. THRILL OF IT chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, ran on to secure the show honors. COLLOQUY chased four to five paths off the inside down the backstretch and then three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch and weakened in the late stages. BOSSMAKINBOSSMOVES broke a beat slow, then got steadied behind foes who took over his lane at the start, chased four then three wide before tucking to the two path, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, went six to seven wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild bid. BIG BOBBY chased three to four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five wide into upper stretch and weakened. MARKET ALERT coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside under coaxing from three furlongs out, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and faltered.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 4 7F Dirt CR: 95. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 102000. (UP TO $17,748 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $62,500. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $62,500 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GOOD SAM chased four then three wide coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung five wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command just inside the eighth pole, edged clear to the finish kept to task. THREE RIVERS chased just off the inside advancing to take command at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, dug in under threat and was collared just inside the eighth pole, ran on well clear of the rest to be along second best. INTO HAPPINESS chased five to six paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five wide into upper stretch and weakened. LADY MILAGRO showed the way in hand along the inside, came under coaxing when under threat and collared for the front at the five-sixteenths, continued in the inside route into upper stretch, tired. STARSHIP DEFIANT chased three wide until tucked inside into the turn, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Milagro
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand ins, coaxed yielded 5/16, inside 1/4, tired

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, up 5/16, 3w upper, collared ins 1/8, 2nd best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Miss Grillo S. - Grade2 BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 5 1 1/16M Turf CR: 84. Stakes Purse 200000. FOR FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HARD TO JUSTIFY three wide in closest aim of the leader, got set down spinning just off the inside into upper stretch, rallied between foes before taking command nearing the eighth pole, dug in under a drive edging away briefly and then holding safe and gamely to prevail. LIFE'S AN AUDIBLE tracked just off the inside from just off the pace, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled three to four wide into upper stretch, surged late to latch on the winner as she hit the finish. WHIMSICALLY three wide in pursuit from just off the pace, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch advancing to take narrow and brief command stacked outside a pair of rivals, got headed near the eighth pole, fought on willingly to the finish. GALA BRAND just off the inside near the rear of the field, chased four paths off the inside down the backstretch before tucking back to the two path through the far turn patiently handled until let out spinning four wide into upper stretch, angled in to the two path nearing the eighth pole and split foes inside that station kicking on belatedly to the wire. MEMORIALIZE three wide through the first turn, tracked four then three wide from mid pack, got set down angled five wide into upper stretch, stayed on one paced through to the finish. GOLD LIGHTNING tracked the pace along the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, weakened in the late stages. LATER DARLING got brushed at the start by SIERRA SKY, who broke outwards, saved ground near the rear of the field, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun two to three wide into upper stretch and offered no kick. SIERRA SKY broke out at the start brushing LATER DARLING, chased three then two wide under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, angled six wide into upper stretch and offered no rally. STEEL LUTE three wide through the first turn, chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled seven wide into upper stretch and offered no response. DANCING SPIRIT bobbled at the break, chased three then two wide, got let out angled four wide into upper stretch, came up empty. CAMILA T (IRE) established the front and showed the way in hand just off the inside, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch under threat from a pair, yielded the front straightened away and weakened through to the finish.

ENTRY.NAME: Hard to Justify
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w in aim, set down 2w 1/4p, up near 1/8, dug in, gamely

ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2p, coaxed 5/16, 3-4w upper, late surge

ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, weakened late

ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled st, chased 3-2w, set down 4w upper, empty

ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 2p, coaxed 5/16, ins 1/4, yielded, weakened

ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p 1st turn, 3-2w at rear, 4w uppr, to 2p 1/8, belatedly

ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 5/16, 6w upper, no rally

ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed st, saved grd near rear, coaxed 5/16, 2-3w uppr, no kick

ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w pursuit, coaxed 5/16, 3w uppr, up, headed, fought on, willing

ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w 1st turn, chased 4-3w, coaxed 5/16, 7w upper, no response

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 28000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SKATE TO HEAVEN got bumped at the start by COLPO D'ORO, dueled briefly with that foe while in hand early on before settling six paths off the inside just off the pace, tucked four wide into the turn and advanced at the three-eighths, swung four to five wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command inside the three-sixteenths and drew clear under a drive kept to task. DADS GOOD RUNNER chased five then four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, went seven wide into upper stretch, improved position and just held for the place honors over a rival on the wire. STRONG LIGHT chased three wide down the backstretch and then five wide througfhthe turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung five wide into upper stretch, improved position to secure the show honors when just missing for the runner up spot. EL DE CHIMI bobbled at the break, advanced to vie briefly three wide before emerging to duel three then two wide with DEE'S SPEEDSTRE to his inside, swung three wide into upper stretch and weakened in the late stages. DEE'S SPEEDSTRE advanced after the break to vie from the two path before emerging to duel with the aforementioned foe from the two path, tucked inside through the turn continuing to knock heads, got set down spinning just off the inside into upper stretch, weakened in the late going. PROVEN HOPE coaxed from the gate, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch, weakened. SCOTTO coaxed from the start, chased along the inside and then just off the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four then three wide into upper stretch and tired. BREAK THE ICE broke out at the start, chased along the inside under coaxing from three furlongs out, continued in the inside route into upper stretch and tired. PAPI ON ICE coaxed from the gate, chased five to six paths off the inside down the backstretch and then four to five wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, swung six wide into upper stretch and made no impact. COLPO D'ORO stumbled at the start recovering outwards and bumping SKATE TO HEAVEN, vied briefly in the five path before chasing three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside for home and faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Scotto
ENTRY.OWNER: Cipriano Vito Scotti Neil Alfleri Anthony and Bochilo Vincent
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased ins, coaxed 2p 3/8, 4-3w upper, tired

ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased ins, coaxed 3/8, inside 1/4, tired

ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 7/16, ins 1/4, weakened

ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 5-6w, coaxed 4-5w 7/16, 6w upper, no impact

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 5-4w, coaxed 3/8, 7w upper, improved, up for place

ENTRY.OWNER: Final Turn Racing Stable LLC and Celeritas Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 2p, dueled ins turn, set down 2w 1/4p, wknd late

ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w backstretch, coaxed 5w 3/8, 5w uppr, improved, just miss place

ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled st, vied 3w briefly, dueled 2p turn, 3w upper, wknd late

ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled st, vied briefly 5p, coaxed 3w 3/8, 2w 1/4p, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Skate to Heaven
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, dueled briefly 6p, 4w turn, 4-5w uppr, drew clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Pilgrim S. - Grade2 BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 7 1 1/16M Outer turf CR: 80. Stakes Purse 200000. OUTER TURF FOR TWO YEAR OLDS.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AGATE ROAD chased two to three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command a sixteenth out coming in slightly at that station, then inched away to the finish to prevail. FULMINEO tracked just off the inside from near the rear of the field, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, rallied and was bumped between foes who each came inwards closing off his seam a sixteenth out, then was along belatedly for the place honors. LIAM'S JOURNEY tracked the pace along the inside, came under coaxing just off the inside at the five-sixteenths, cut the corner into upper stretch, dug in under a drive and came in slightly bumping FULMINEO in tandem with SPIRIT PRINCE a sixteenth out while offering up a mild bid. SPIRIT PRINCE coaxed from the gate, showed the way in hand along the inside, cut the corner into upper stretch, dug in under threat and came out slightly a sixteenth out when collared for the front, bumped with FULMINEO at that station and ran on to the finish. TRIPLE ESPRESSO settled just off the inside at the tail of the field, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled five to six wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild bid. B D SAINTS coaxed from the gate, chased two to three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, continued two to three wide into upper stretch, offered no response. TIFAREEH chased along the inside and then just off the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, continued just off the inside into upper stretch and weakened in the late stages. GET SPOOLED coaxed from the gate, raced two to three wide in closest aim of the leader, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch and weakened. There was a Stewards' Inquiry into the stretch run as well as a claim of foul by the rider of FULMINEO alleging interference against AGATE ROAD. After review, the result was allowed to stand and the claim of foul was dismissed prior to the race being declared official.

ENTRY.NAME: dh-Liam's Journey
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked ins, coaxed 2p 5/16, cut corner, bump foe 1/16, mild bid

ENTRY.NAME: Agate Road
ENTRY.OWNER: Repole Stable and St Elias Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2-3w pursuit, coaxed 5/16, 5w upper, up 1/16, inched away

ENTRY.NAME: Tifareeh
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased ins, coaxed 2p 5/16, 2w 1/4p, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: B D Saints
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2-3w, coaxed 5/16, 2-3w upper, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Get Spooled
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, 2-3w in aim, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Triple Espresso
ENTRY.OWNER: Repole Stable and St Elias Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p at rear, coaxed 5/16, 5-6w upper, mild bid

ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2p, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, bump btw 1/16p, belatedly

ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand ins, cut corner, bump foe 1/16, ran on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 8 1 1/8M Dirt CR: 95. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 102000. (UP TO $17,748 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $62,500. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $62,500 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At TimeO f Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TIZZY IN THE SKY coaxed from the gate, showed the way in hand just off the inside, came under coaxing near the quarter pole, took the inside route into upper stretch, went clear under a drive to prevail. FIRELINE chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch, proved no match for the top one while along for the place honors in the final jumps. KNOW IT ALL AUDREY chased three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, continued three wide into upper stretch, proved no match for the top one, kept on to the finish to preserve the show honors. FROSTY O TOOLE coaxed from the gate, chased two to three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide for home, was never a threat to the winner while keeping on through to the finish. ANATOLIAN chased two to three wide, came under coaxing four wide at the seven-sixteenths, angled six wide into upper stretch and tired. TOUGH STREET three wide through the first turn, chased four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five to six wide into upper stretch, tired. MIRANDA'S ROCKY three wide through the first turn, chased four to five wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, angled six to seven wide into upper stretch, made no impact.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 9 1M Turf CR: 104. Allowance Purse 100000. (UP TO $17,400 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs. (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile on the Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: I'M VERY BUSY coaxed from the gate, tracked the pace along the inside patiently handled until set down spinning three wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command near the eighth pole, edged clear under a drive kept to task. FREDO coaxed from the gate, dueled inside of NARCISO DALI from the get go, came under coaxing nearing the quarter pole and spun just off the inside into upper stretch shaking off his main pace rival, dug in under threat and was caught nearing the eighth pole, ran on to preserve the place honors. CAPTURE THE FLAG two then three wide in pursuit, got set down spinning just off the inside into upper stretch, improved position to secure the show honors. BE OF COURAGE chased three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled six wide into upper stretch, passed tired rivals. RUSE three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled four wide into upper stretch, weakened. HEATHGUARD chased along the inside and then just off the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled six wide into upper stretch, offered no response. YACOWLEF (IRE) chased just off the inside, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch, weakened. FIGHTER IN THE WIN chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch, tired. SELL SOMETHING coaxed from the gate, chased two to three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, went seven wide into upper stretch, made no impact. NARCISO DALI coaxed from the gate, raced forwardly placed from the start hooking up with FREDO in head to head combat just off the inside through the first turn, dueled from the two path coming under coaxing three furlongs from home, tipped out five wide into upper stretch in the midst of being shaken off and tired in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Fredo
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, dueled ins, coaxed near 1/4, 2w 1/4p, caught, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Heathguard
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 2p 5/16, angled 6w upper, no response

ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2-3w, coaxed 5/16, 7w upper, no impact

ENTRY.COMMENT: 2-3w pursuit, set down 2w 1/4p, improved

ENTRY.OWNER: Chichakly Amira Irwin Mark and Diamond William R
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, dueled 2p, coaxed 3/8, angled 5w upper, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 10 6F Outer turf CR: 82. Maiden Special Weight Purse 75000. OUTER TURF FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (Rail at 27 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WOKE UP QUICK dueled early on from the three path before emerging to show the way three then two wide, cut the corner into upper stretch, dug in under a drive and held on to prevail. BIG PRANKSTER coaxed from the gate, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch, closed well but was ultimately repelled to the wire. AZ U CHASE ME coaxed from the gate, chased three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild kick. NANO MAN hard to load, veered in at the start bumping DRINKING SOLO into SAVAGE SPIRIT, dueled from the two path briefly with WOKE UP QUICK, then chased tucked to the inside through the turn, continued in the inside route into upper stretch and ran on to the finish. PRICE IS TRUTH coaxed from the start, chased three to four wide until tucked to the two path into the turn, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and cornered just off the inside into upper stretch, then weakened in the late stages. ROB THE BANK chased just off the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch, offered no response. SORORITY PRANK chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch, offered no rally. DRINKING SOLO broke in at the start and was bumped by NANO MAN into SAVAGE SPIRIT, chased just off the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, continued just off the inside into upper stretch and tired. SAVAGE SPIRIT got bumped solidly at the start and conceded five lengths to the front before settling into stride, chased five then four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four wide for home, made no impact. MITHRIDATES four then three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing three furlongs from home, swung three wide into upper stretch, tired.
